text: Johann Georg Mozart (May 4, 1679 â€” February 19, 1736) was a German bookbinder who lived in Augsburg in the 17th & 18th centuries. He was the father of Leopold Mozart and the grandfather of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart. He was the son of Franz Mozart, a German mason. title: Johann Georg Mozart
